devdoc.author: Angle Labs, Inc.
devdoc.details: This contract only contains view functions to be queried off-chain. It was thus not optimized for gas consumption

getControlledVaults(address,address).details: This function is never to be called on-chain since it iterates over all vaultIDs. It is here to reduce dependency on an external graph to link an ID to its owner

params.spender: Address for which vault ownerships should be checked
params.vaultManager: VaultManager address to query vaultIDs on

returns._0: List of `vaultID` controlled by this address
returns._1: Count of vaults owned by the address

devdoc.title: AngleBorrowHelpers

getControlledVaults(address,address).notice: Returns all the vaults owned or controlled (under the form of approval) by an address

userdoc.notice: Contract with view functions designed to facilitate integrations on the Borrow module of the Angle Protocol
